item.title: Spring Boot中使用MongoDB
item.description: pom文件中 1 2 3 4 5 6 <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb</artifactId> </dependency> </dependencies> application.properties中 1 2 3 4 ##mongo配置 spring.data.mongodb.host=127.0.0.1 spring.data.mongodb.port=27017 spring.data.mongodb.database=test 主类中 1 @SpringBootApplication(exclude = DataSourceAutoConfiguration.class)
